text: Live Hits is the first live DVD released by English singer-songwriter Melanie Chisholm. Recorded in August 2006 at The Bridge in south-east London and features Melanie performing a selection of songs from her first three albums in both acoustic and full band sets. The DVD has sold over 100,000 copies in total.
